From: "Eric Riou du Cosquer" <eri@...>

Hi there,

When all my tests are successful, I would like to display directly the "Test
Hierarchy" tab instead of the "Failures" tab.
Is there an option to do that while launching TestRunner ?

Thanks for your help,

Eric
subject: Display the "TestHierarchy" tab
